synopsis.text: Illya is an ordinary schoolgirl who lives with her brother and sister-in-law. One night, a magic wand called Magical Ruby falls into her bath and convinces her to become a magical girl. She is then thrust into a quest to collect seven Class Cards along with her friend Miyu. In the second part of the story, Illya continues her adventures while struggling to maintain a normal daily life. After a beach trip takes an unexpected magical turn, Illya finds herself caught up in various magical escapades involving love potions, boys' love comics, and more wacky diversions. However, her ultimate mission remains recovering the final missing Class Card. Through all the absurdity and chaos, Illya grows in her role as a magical girl. Though she originally became one by chance, she steps up with courage to take on each new supernatural challenge. With steadfast friends and unpredictable magic by her side, Illya's life has been forever changed since the fateful night Magical Ruby came into her life.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
